text: Brovary (, ; before 1969 known as Brovari) is a city in Kyiv Oblast (Region) in northern Ukraine, an eastern suburb of the country's capital, Kyiv. It is the administrative centre of Brovary Raion (district). ==Other websites== * Missile blasts Ukraine flats (BBC). * History of broadcasting in Brovary * Large collection of free photos of the city of Brovary Category:Cities in Kyiv Oblast
title: Brovary
